meanings.sent1: The antiallergy medication helped me feel better during allergy season.
meanings.sent2: She bought antiallergy bedding to reduce her allergic symptoms.
meanings.sent3: The antiallergy lotion made her skin so smooth, it was like magic!
meanings.sent4: His calming presence was like an antiallergy balm for her anxious mind.
meanings.sent5: The antiallergy spray created a protective shield against pollen.

meanings.definition: A substance or treatment that helps to reduce allergic reactions.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed an antiallergy for his severe allergies.
meanings.sent2: She always carries her antiallergy with her in case of an allergic reaction.
meanings.sent3: The antiallergy was so effective that he could finally enjoy the outdoors without sneezing.
meanings.sent4: Her love for animals was like an antiallergy, helping her overcome her pet allergies.
meanings.sent5: The antiallergy injection provided instant relief from the allergic symptoms.
